data.title: Reversi Simulation
data.solution:
# String board solution

n = int(input())
board = input()

print(board)

while board.count(board[0]) != n:
  i = max(board.rfind('BW'), board.rfind('WB'))
  board = board[:i] + board[i] * (n - i)
  print(board)

# Bitboard solution

'''
n = int(input())
board = input()

print(board)

bitboard = int(board.replace('B', '0').replace('W', '1'), 2)
while bitboard + 1 != 1 << n and bitboard != 0:
  bitboard ^= (bitboard & ~(bitboard - 1), ~bitboard & (bitboard + 1))[bitboard & 1] - 1
  print(bin(bitboard)[2:].zfill(n).replace('0', 'B').replace('1', 'W'))
'''
